casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Carlton Washington TOMLINSON. No. 319P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 5, 2015.

<page vol="778" reporter="S.E.2d" no="83" /> The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of September 2015 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Dissolved by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of November 2015."
